name: Shadows of A New Form
description:
Didn't get everything done that I hoped, so right now it's basically just an endless dungeon crawler. I'm hoping to work on it more after the jam.

WASD - move

LMB - fire

SPACE - push/shove

M - map

P - pause

Controls are rebindable on the main menu. Didn't test the Mac build since I don't have that machine. Linux users can download the Godot game engine (godotengine.org), download the source project and run it that way.
